title: Pricing of wrapped Bitcoin and Ethereum on-chain options
summary: This paper measures price differences between Hegic option quotes on Arbitrum and a model-based benchmark built on Black--Scholes model with regime-sensitive volatility estimated via a two-regime MS-AR-(GJR)-GARCH model.
